card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Codeking Number Nine
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Your opponent can't cast spells.

card.name: Heaven's Double Tail
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. If you have an Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose both: :► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. :► Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Andorom, Chanting Wings
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Koltiolu, Scale Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Master Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Commanduo, Order Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Red Rose, Crimson Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Freeze Charger
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ Charger

card.name: Raraa, Trust Ball
card.text: ■ Your light Commands cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 light cards in your mana zone, your light Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Angel Feather
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Take a light spell and a light command from the revealed cards and put them into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Generarose, Red Rose Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 6 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Pikarie, Radiance Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.
